Name: Butler
Desc: A perfect butler for a perfect you.

1.Name: Tea Break
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Creates a heartfelt afternoon snack. The snack will generate Energy for the receiving Agent once made and delivered.

1.Name: Personal Butler
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Victoria Housekeeping Co.</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> generates an additional 20% Energy.

2.Desc:

1.Name: Afternoon Dessert
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Use a frying pan and pancakes to attack enemies from afar, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
